TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_biru, title = biru, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/biru} }

S.FORM: == biru == biru ka sawn naha wncyen hya ga maki qu ke' bniru naha qsahuy nya. zyuwaw nya biru hya ga baqun lmpuw.
== biro == biro ka sawn naha wncyen hya ga maki qo ke' bniro naha qsahoy nya. zyowaw nya biro hya ga baqon lmpow.
